name: Split-shot West
description:
Split-shot West

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A Short Simple 2D Western Shoot'em Up

Thanks Julian For Music.

Made In A Couple Weeks For Newground's Pixel Day 2023, Would Have Liked To Have Done More With This Project/ Concept Like More Enemy Variety And Destructible Objects + Better Sprites, But Alas I Am Horrible At Time Management. Anyway Happy Pixel Day!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

Normal Mode:

"Arrow Keys" - Movement

"Z" - Enter Shooting Mode

"X" - Dodge

Use The Dodge To Move Through Bullets

Shooting Mode:

"Arrow Keys" - Aiming

"Z" - Fire

"X" - Exit Shooting Mode & Reload

When In Fire Mode You Will Only See Objects Your Character Was Facing Before Hand.

"Escape Key" - Leave Current Level

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
